contents.content: UNIT 04 面试技巧 Interview Skills
Lesson 5 走出陷阱与误区 Getting Out of Pitfalls and Errors
场景对话
杰克和玛丽在谈论面试中容易出现的失误。
Jack: We always make mistakes in our daily life, so do we in the interview.
Jack: Only in this way can you leave a good impression on the interviewer.
Mary: Firstly, you should use decent manners and words
职场达人小技巧    面试禁忌须知    面试时，个别求职者往往会因为忽视了某些细节，而影响面试效果。要想求职成功，这些面试禁忌可要牢记哦！    1．忌握手无力。握手时应力度适中，与对方保持合适的距离。
Jack: Don't make any petty action now and then.
Mary: Your statement should be clear and brief to the point.
Jack: Lengthy speeches will not get the interviewer to know your intents.
Mary: Don't be too reserved. A usual mind is just OK.
Jack: Don't ask questions that the interviewer has already explained.
2．忌举止失当。面试时绝不能做小动作，如摇头晃脑、东张西望、频频改变坐姿。    3．忌言语离题。最好开门见山，直奔主题。面试官不会浪费时间猜测你真正想表达的是什么。    4．忌言语失当。鲁莽的言语，轻率的表达，并不代表你不拘小节，反倒令人反感生厌。
Mary: Dull expressions and empty eyes should be avoided.
Mary: Sure. Details decide success or failure.
5．忌提问幼稚。在提问时要考虑，自己的问题是否有价值，面试官是否已经回答过或解释过。    6．忌神情僵滞。如果对方说话时你双眼无神、反应迟钝，一定不会给人留下好的印象。    7．忌过分拘谨。不要过多理会面试官的态度。即便对方不苟言笑，目光犀利，求职者也不要心生怯意，正常发挥就好。
必背例句

contents.title: 你的表述应当清晰明了，不要长篇大论。
contents.answer: Be sure to make your statement clear and concise and avoid tirade.

contents.title: 这样那样的失误在面试中应当避免。
contents.answer: Such-and-such mistakes should be avoided in the interview.

contents.title: 应当牢记，在面试中要展示出自己最好的一面。
contents.answer: Keep fi rmly in mind that you should present the best of yourself in the interview.

contents.title: 如果你不注意细节，可能会给面试官留下不好的印象。
contents.answer: You may leave a bad impression on the interviewer if you miss the details.

contents.title: 即便你很紧张，也不要东张西望。
contents.answer: Don't look around even if you are quite nervous.

contents.title: 不要让面试官来猜测你要表达的是什么意思。
contents.answer: Never should you leave the interviewer to guess what you mean.

contents.title: 空洞的目光可能说明你缺乏自信。
contents.answer: Dull eyes may show your lack of confi dence.

contents.title: 在面试中保持平常心是很重要的。
contents.answer: A usual mind is quite important in the interview.

contents.title: 呆板的神情可能会引起面试官的反感。
contents.answer: Dull expressions may lead to antipathy of the interviewer.

contents.title: 重复的问题说明你缺乏深思熟虑。
contents.answer: Repeated questions can show your lack of well thought.

contents.content: 核心词汇总
little things小动作
take place 发生
now and then时不时地
lead to 引起，导致
